title.rendered: Easy NFT carding method: How to Card an NFT in Less Than 10 Minutes

content.rendered:
In this carding guide, I will be teaching you how to purchase NFTs with a stolen virtual credit card. This can be a great way to get your hands on some valuable digital assets without having to spend any of your own money. Of course, this method is risk-free when you take all the necessary precautions before carding anything.

More Than $100M. Worth of NFTs Have Been Carded This Year, a New Report Finds:

One of the best things about NFTs is that they can be stored entirely on the blockchain. This means that there is no need to worry about physical security, like you would with traditional assets such as gold or silver. However, it also means that you need to be extra careful about the digital security of your carding operation. Be sure to use a reliable VPN to protect your identity.

NFT CARDING METHOD REQUIREMENTS:

  • Non vbv fullz card from wcc-plug.su or cardingbot.su
  • Verification software from wcc-plug.su or cardingbot.su
  • VPN
  • A crypto wallet to receive your NFT. (HOW TO SETUP PHANTOM wallet)

in this nft carding method we will be verifying Identity through Carding Genie, but WCC’s verification service also works for this method.
